MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 24-NOV-2020 23:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.50pm following reports of a damaged underground cable located on Cleghorn Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.25pm on Wednesday 24th November 2020.
